title: Chinese new Ambassador to Pakistan Jiang Zaidong arrives in Islamabad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 06 (APP): Chinese new Ambassador to Pakistan Jiang Zaidong on Wednesday arrived in Islamabad to assume the charge.
The Ambassador was warmly welcomed by Pakistani officials and representatives of the Embassy, said a news release issued here.
Ambassador Jiang is committed to strengthening Chinaâ€™s ironclad friendship and all-weather strategic cooperation with Pakistan.
